hanzi-su-wiki:
添

Значения

Добавлять, прилагать, прибавлять; быть в сопровождении кого-либо; сопровождать, следовать за

Мнемоника

Сердечное 心 желание земледельца, чтобы небо 天 дало бы побольше дождя 氵.
purpleculture_pinyin:
tiān
to add; to increase; to replenish
добавить; увеличить; пополнять
rtega_mnemonic:
添添RSappend, add to, increase
  • water 氵 weighing heavy 忝: it has been added to to clothes
purpleculture_info:
Synonym: 增 加
Antonyms: 减
Pictophonetic: 忝 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
增添 [ zēng tiān ]: to add; to increase
添加剂 [ tiān jiā jì ]: additive; food additive
添加 [ tiān jiā ]: to add; to increase
添置 [ tiān zhì ]: to buy; to acquire; to add to one's possessions
锦上添花 [ jǐn shàng tiān huā ]: lit. on brocade, add flowers (idiom); to decorate sth already perfect; gilding the lily
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 忝 [ tiǎn ] shame, disgrace; self-depreciation
heisig_chinese_memo: Hawaii is a little drop of heaven nestled in the waters of the Pacific, most often visited by honeymooners and valentines trying to augment their honeymoon with a little something extra special. It was annexed to the U.S.A. in 1959, and more recently to Japan as well-- albeit only unofficially, and through private commercial holdings.
heisig_constituent: annexed, water, water droplets, water pistol, heavens, valentine
Keyword_KANJIDIC: annexed, accompany, marry, suit, meet, satisfy, attach, append, garnish, imitate
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: прилагаемые к ней, сопровождать, жениться, костюм, встречайте, удовлетворяет условие, приложите, Append, гарнир, имитируем
koohiiStory1: Hawaii is a little drop of heaven nestled in the waters of the Pacific, most often visited by honeymooners and valentines. It was annexed to the U.S.A. in 1959, and more recently to Japan as well-- albeit only unofficially, and through private commercial holdings.
koohiiStory2: Annexed to the U.S.A. in 1898, Hawaii is nestled in the waters of the Pacific, a little drop of heaven, often visited on Valentines.. (from Ihatobu with the date corrected. Hawaii became a state in 1959)...　RTK2:　テン　添付　てんぷ(appendix).
kunYomi: そ.える、そ.う、も.える、も.う
jp_example_words:
添う(そう): to accompany, to become married, to comply with
添える(そえる): to add to, to attach, to append, to accompany, to garnish, to imitate, to annex
jp_readingExamples: 添う (そ.う), 添える (そ.える)
WaniKani_Radicals: 氵, 天, 小, 丶
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There’s a tsunami in heaven and you take a small drop of water and append it to the tsunami. Now the tsunami is big enough to destroy all of heaven. The small drop that you appended to the tsunami was just enough to push it over the edge, reaching full destruction capability.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Take a small drop of water and append it to the tsunami. Feel the drop of water on your finger and visualize yourself flicking it at the tsunami as it races towards heaven.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Just after you append the small drop of water to the tsunami, it grows ten (てん) stories high. Before it was only nine, but since you appended that drop, the tsunami is now a full ten stories tall.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Look up at this ten story tall tsunami. It looks big and powerful. Feel the water spray from the tsunami as it towers over you.
Ru_Meaning: annexed, accompany, marry, suit, meet, satisfy, attach, append, garnish, imitate
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 大 (большой), 汁 (суп), 心 (сердце)
Ru_trainchinese: tiān: (глаг) добавлять, увеличивать; произвести на свет, родить (ребенка)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the calamity of the heart (忝) in the water (氵) is to accompany you
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Hawaii is a little drop of heaven nestled in the waters of the Pacific, most often visited by honeymooners and valentines trying to augment their honeymoon with a little something extra special. It was annexed to the U.S.A. in 1959, and more recently to Japan as well-- albeit only unofficially, and through private commercial holdings.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " water " and "忝", the original meaning is increase. "Jade Chapter-Water Ministry": "Tim, benefit." Song Luyou, "Shuangqiaodao Zhonghanzhi": "The cracking face cream is fast and the wind is like a sickle, and the heavy fur pants are still added at night."

" Tim " can mean childbirth. Yuan Zheng Guangzu's "A Beautiful Girl Lies" has the 1st fold: "At the beginning, my parents had married their mothers by fingertips. My mother gave birth to a child, and my mother gave birth to a young lady."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and "忝", the original meaning is increase.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「忝」聲，本義為增加。《玉篇‧水部》：「添，益也。」宋陸游〈雙橋道中寒甚〉：「裂面霜風快似鐮，重重裘褲晚仍添。」

　　「添」可表示生育，元鄭光祖《倩女離魂》第1摺：「當初先父母曾與母親指腹成親。俺母親生下小生，母親添了小姐。」

Lesson: 22 frameNoV4: 634 frameNoV6: 684 Strokes: 11 Jouyou Grade: JH JLPT: 1
添う(そう): to accompany, to become married, to comply with
添える(そえる): to add to, to attach, to append, to accompany, to garnish, to imitate, to annex

從「 水 」，「 忝 」聲，本義為增加。《玉篇‧水部》：「添，益也。」宋陸游〈雙橋道中寒甚〉：「裂面霜風快似鐮，重重裘褲晚仍添。」 「 添 」可表示生育，元鄭光祖《倩女離魂》第1摺：「當初先父母曾與母親指腹成親。俺母親生下小生，母親添了小姐。」
From the sound of " water" and " 忝", the original meaning is increase. "Jade Chapter-Water Ministry": "Tim, benefit." Song Luyou, "Shuangqiaodao Zhonghanzhi": "The cracking face cream is fast and the wind is like a sickle, and the heavy fur pants are still added at night." " Tim" can mean childbirth. Yuan Zheng Guangzu's "A Beautiful Girl Lies" has the 1st fold: "At the beginning, my parents had married their mothers by fingertips. My mother gave birth to a child, and my mother gave birth to a young lady."

添字的基本解释

添
tiān
增加：增添。添设。添补。锦上添花。
加

添字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tiān］
［《廣韻》他兼切，平添，透。］
(1)增加，增补。
(2)生育。
(3)姓。宋有添颖。见《姓苑》。

添字的英文翻译

◎ 添
appose, increase

添字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　添； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页632第19
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?他兼切，音沾。【玉篇】益也。通作沾酟。　又【集韻】他念切，音栝。味益也。【李翊俗名小錄】呼下酒具爲添。

添字的源字形

添字的起名意思

：指增加。

形声字。?(水)表意,表示水漫出;泰(tian)表声。本义是水漫出。引申为增加。

Radicals: 氵, 天, 小, 丶  (tsunami, heaven, small, drop)
Meaning Mnemonic
There’s a tsunami in heaven and you take a small drop of water and append it to the tsunami. Now the tsunami is big enough to destroy all of heaven. The small drop that you appended to the tsunami was just enough to push it over the edge, reaching full destruction capability.
Take a small drop of water and append it to the tsunami. Feel the drop of water on your finger and visualize yourself flicking it at the tsunami as it races towards heaven.
Reading Mnemonic
Just after you append the small drop of water to the tsunami, it grows ten (てん) stories high. Before it was only nine, but since you appended that drop, the tsunami is now a full ten stories tall.
Look up at this ten story tall tsunami. It looks big and powerful. Feel the water spray from the tsunami as it towers over you.
